core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Airport Utility with Fintech Precision
Emotion First: The feeling of a high-tech night-shift command center
Content is King: Data clarity is paramount, but style makes it usable
Negative Space: Use gap-6 or gap-8 to let data breathe
Contrast: High contrast for readability in dark environments

typography.installation: Ensure fonts are imported via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS.

buttons.style: rounded-sm font-bold uppercase tracking-wide text-sm transition-all duration-200
buttons.secondary: bg-zinc-800 text-zinc-300 hover:bg-zinc-700 hover:text-white border border-zinc-700

cards.style: rounded-lg border border-white/5 bg-zinc-900/40 backdrop-blur-md shadow-lg hover:border-white/10 transition-colors

inputs.style: bg-zinc-950/50 border-zinc-800 focus:border-amber-500/50 focus:ring-amber-500/20 rounded-md text-zinc-100 placeholder:text-zinc-600

tables.header: text-xs uppercase bg-zinc-900/50 text-zinc-500 font-mono tracking-wider py-3 px-4
tables.row: border-b border-zinc-800/50 hover:bg-white/5 transition-colors py-3 px-4

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure amber text on black meets 4.5:1 ratio (use amber-500, not 400 for text)

implementation_steps: 1. Setup Theme: Configure tailwind.config.js with colors and fonts.
2. Install Deps: `yarn add framer-motion @radix-ui/react-icons lucide-react recharts clsx tailwind-merge`
3. Global CSS: Add @import url for Google Fonts (Chivo, Manrope, JetBrains Mono).
4. Create Layouts: Build Sidebar (responsive) and Dashboard Shell.
5. Build Components: KPI Cards, Charts, Tables using glassmorphism styles.
6. Assemble Pages: Login, Dashboard, Drivers, SIJ Input.
7. Polish: Add framer-motion animations to page transitions and list items.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetic (generic centered layouts, uniform styling).
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Do NOT apply universal transition (transition: all).
Do NOT center align the app container.
Use modern button styles (pill-shaped or sharp) with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures/noise overlays separate good from extraordinary.
Use named exports for components, default for pages.
